dcterms:description: The dataset comprises of 3 sound modalities, namely breathing, cough, and speech with 965 sound samples of which 17.2% belong to COVID-19 positive class. This extreme class imbalance reflects the typical real world COVID-19 scenario.
dcterms:title: DiCOVA-2

dcterms:description: The dataset is used for audio classification tasks, specifically for language identification from speech recordings.
